cards.name: Quick Draw
cards.description: Draw a thehuman:Weapon. ( thehuman:Shoot ( 1 x 6, 4 % ) a random enemy. )

cards.name: Refresh
cards.description:
Draw a card.
If this card is discarded, draw 3 (4) cards and restore 3 (4) Health.

cards.name: Salvage
cards.description:
Shuffle your hand back into your draw pile.
For each card shuffled this way, return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Scuffle
cards.description:
Deal 1 (2) damage to a random enemy 3 times.
Deal damage an additional time for each thehuman:Healthiness you have over 8.
Discard a random card.

cards.name: Teatime
cards.description:
Gain 1 (2) thehuman:Healthiness.
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Ageing
cards.description:

cards.name: Aggressiveness

cards.name: Angst
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards from your hand.
For each card discarded, gain 1 Temporary Strength.

cards.name: Arcade
cards.description: For each energy you have, deal 3 (4) damage to a random enemy and thehuman:Uncover a card.

cards.name: Arsenal

It Purges when used and at the end of your turn.

cards.description: Apply 1 Ageing and 2 thehuman:Injured to ALL enemies.

Draw 2 cards.

Then, draw that many cards.

cards.name: Self Defense

cards.name: Speedloader
cards.description:
While this is in your hand, whenever you thehuman:Shoot a thehuman:Weapon, thehuman:Shoot (4 x 2, 10% ) a random enemy.

cards.name: Spring Cleaning
cards.description:
Exhaust your discard pile.
For each card Exhausted this way, deal 9 (11) damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Survivalist

Deal 5 (8) damage to ALL enemies and gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Tinker

thehuman:Uncover 3 (4) cards.

Draw 10 cards.

Draw 5 cards.

Add 2 Slaps to your hand that cost 0, but Purge when used and at the end of your turn.
Technique: Deal 10 (15) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Superslap
cards.description: Play 5 Slaps with random targets.

cards.name: The Trash Monster
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, find 1 thehuman:Junk.
Whenever you play 3 (2) thehuman:Junk, deal 5 damage to a random enemy, then gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.

relics.name: Thumbs Up
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, gain 5 Healthiness and 5 Block.

There are 4 levels of healthiness: Healthy ( 0 - 10 ), Very Healthy ( 11 - 18 ) and Extremely Healthy ( > 18 ).

Card Rewards have 4 choices instead of 3.

relics.name: Emerald Eyepiece
relics.description:
Whenever you spend Gold, if you have more than 200 Gold, gain 20 Gold.
Otherwise, gain 30 Gold.

relics.name: Environmentalist
relics.description: At the start of your turn, add a random Junk to your hand.

relics.name: Secret Training
relics.description:
Usable once per combat.

Draw 3 cards and add a Stabby Stabby to your hand.
relics.flavorText: The best way to avoid detection is to...be a ninja?

relics.name: Fire Arms
relics.description: Whenever you Shoot a Weapon, also apply 1 Burning to the target.
relics.flavorText: A revolutionary step backward in peacemaking efforts.

keywords.name: Thehuman:healthiness
keywords.description: Keep your healthiness high! The higher your healthiness, the more likely that positive effects will be applied, and vice versa.

keywords.name: Thehuman:injured
keywords.description: At the start of each turn, lose 1 to 4 health randomly for each stack of this applied.

keywords.name: Thehuman:inventory
keywords.description:
Return this card to your hand whenever it is played.

This card retains if it was not used this turn.

The cost of this card cannot be reduced below 1.

keywords.name: Thehuman:junk
keywords.description: Junk consists of cheap and useful cards.

keywords.name: Thehuman:peaceful
keywords.description: When attacked, negate damage equal to the amount of Peaceful you have.

keywords.name: Thehuman:shoot
keywords.description:
Shooting is a form of damage applied by certain ranged weapons. The damage per shot (A) is multiplied by the number of shots (B) with a Critical chance (C) and is displayed in (A x B, C) form.

After each shot, shuffle an Empty Cartridge into your draw pile.

keywords.name: Thehuman:unblockable
keywords.description: Damage of this type cannot be Blocked.

keywords.name: Thehuman:uncover
keywords.description: Obtain ANY Red, Green, Blue, Purple or Colorless card. It costs 0 but Purges when used and at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Thehuman:weapon
keywords.description: Weapons are valuable cards with attack-oriented effects.

mods.name: The Human
mods.description: Adds Harold the Human as a playable character.
